test_cases.name: create_user_post_endpoint
test_cases.evaluation_criteria:
The generated test should:
1. Test the main positive scenario for a POST endpoint to create a user
2. Use the UserService.createUser method with proper TypeScript types (UserModel)
3. Use proper assertions using optional chaining (e.g., response.data?.id)
4. Generate random values for required fields (name, email) to avoid collisions
